argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | climcn1lem.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | climcn1lem.2 | |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) |
| 3 |  | climcn1lem.4 | |- ( ph -> G e. W ) |
| 4 |  | climcn1lem.5 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | climcn1lem.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | climabs.7 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( abs ` ( F ` k ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_absf | |- abs : CC --> RR |
| 8 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 9 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( abs : CC --> RR /\ RR C_ CC ) -> abs : CC --> CC ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_mp2an | |- abs : CC --> CC |
| 11 |  | #P_abscn2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ x e. RR+ ) -> E. y e. RR+ A. z e. CC ( ( abs ` ( z - A ) ) < y -> ( abs ` ( ( abs ` z ) - ( abs ` A ) ) ) < x ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10, 11, 6 | #P_climcn1lem | |- ( ph -> G ~~> ( abs ` A ) ) |
